text: Alex Lutz (born 24 August 1978) is a French actor, comedian and director. He is best known for his role of Catherine in La revue de presse de Catherine et Liliane in Le Petit Journal. ==Theater== He worked with comedian like Malik Bentalha, Pierre Palmade, Michèle Laroque, Jean-Loup Dabadie, Sylvie Joly, Audrey Lamy in different play or one man show as a comedian or a director. ==Filmography== === Actor === {| class="wikitable sortable" |- !
